channel.title: How to get on to a WoW private server
channel.description:
If this is agianst the rules. im sorry. So, first thing you need to do is to Download WoW. To do this without having to pay money, go to this site [url=https://signup.worldofwarcraft.com/trial/10dayfreetrial.htm]https://signup.worldofwarcraft.com/trial/10dayfreetrial.htm[/url] So now that your there, you will see a big button Saying Create 10 day trial. Um, No. Look below it, and it will have 2 links. [code]If you have already created your free trial account, you may download the game directly: [PC] [MAC].[/code] Download the Approriate Version for you. This downloads a downloader that downlaods the game onto your computer. the game is 3.6 GigaBytes. It took me 2 days and 18 hours to download it. So do it. Now, once it is done, install WOW to your computer. Then when you try to run the game, you must log in with an account. So make a 10 day trial account, and log in with it. It will then tell you you have to update, so do it. This file is around 650mb. Now one thats done downloading, it will patch it to 2.3x. Now your ready to play on Private servers. THIS IS THE HARDER PART KIND OF. First, you must find a good Private Server. I reconmend MeahWoW, but thats just me. So to get started, Google WoW private servers, or meahwow. Make sure you find one that gives you the option of Burning Crusade, but doesnt MAKE you do it. Here is a pic of a List of Server homepages [url=http://img516.imageshack.us/img516/5064/picturenumber1ew9.jpg]http://img516.imageshack.us/img516/5064/picturenumber1ew9.jpg[/url] Now, go to that website, and sign up for account. Make sure its not a forum account, but a game account [url=http://img116.imageshack.us/img116/321/wow2je9.png]http://img116.imageshack.us/img116/321/wow2je9.png[/url] Now, your ready to find the realm. Look around the website for How to connect or something along that line. [url=http://img516.imageshack.us/img516/3023/wow3ub7.png]http://img516.imageshack.us/img516/3023/wow3ub7.png[/url]this example gives you it to download. Now, go to where WoW is Installed (Usually C:\ProgramFiles\WorldOfWarcraft) and find Realmlist.wtf And open it with NotePad. It should say this
set realmlist us.logon.worldofwarcraft.com set patchlist us.version.worldofwarcraft.com
Now, on the website, it should give the realm ip, so lets use meahrealm (cause thats what i use, i dont work for them or anything) so replace
set realmlist us.logon.worldofwarcraft.com set patchlist us.version.worldofwarcraft.com
With
set realmlist newmeahwow.dyndns.org
Now, you can start up your WoW and you can log onto the account you created! It should work. Good Luck!

item.dc:creator: @nicodk nicodk
item.description:
@nicodk wrote:

mmowned.com if you wanna make your own server., play on others, get wow hacks, c heats, scams and so on.

http://www.wowstatus.net/

Might be nice to include some pictures, just incase some retard screws up.

item.title: How to get on to a WoW private server
item.dc:creator: @Cryme_Time Cryme Time
item.description:
@Cryme_Time wrote:

Dude. There is a how to access a WoW private server on every WoW private server website. I played WoW private servers with my friend for a week, they are same thing as paying 15$ mo. Its worth it but not many people play, but there some wierd ass glitches.

item.title: How to get on to a WoW private server
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Songoty, post:4, topic:161156”][quote author=Unid H4x0r link=topic=219392.msg1902935#msg1902935 date=1196235616]
You do know this epic fail if it doesnt work? 2GB
[/quote]
Im confused, it epic fail if it doesnt work? 2gb? Do it, i bet you havnt.

Completely offtopic, but do you own a Dell?

Anyway, you should probably keep “set patchlist us.version.worldofwarcraft.com” in the relmlist.wtf, so it looks like this:

set realmlist newmeahwow.dyndns.org
set patchlist us.version.worldofwarcraft.com

yea, you can, i guess you should, but it works without[/quote]

[quote=“the fu superior, post:6, topic:161156”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=219392.msg1903076#msg1903076 date=1196243571]
Completely offtopic, but do you own a Dell?

Anyway, you should probably keep “set patchlist us.version.worldofwarcraft.com” in the relmlist.wtf, so it looks like this:

set realmlist newmeahwow.dyndns.org
set patchlist us.version.worldofwarcraft.com
[/quote]

you WOULD want that, but some other servers that dont support latest version require u remove the patchlist so u dont automatically get patched up to date[/quote]

Ok, my mistake.

Read full topic
item.source: How to get on to a WoW private server

item.title: How to get on to a WoW private server
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:3, topic:161156”]Completely offtopic, but do you own a Dell?

Anyway, you should probably keep “set patchlist us.version.worldofwarcraft.com” in the relmlist.wtf, so it looks like this:

set realmlist newmeahwow.dyndns.org
set patchlist us.version.worldofwarcraft.com[/quote]

you WOULD want that, but some other servers that dont support latest version require u remove the patchlist so u dont automatically get patched up to date

item.title: How to get on to a WoW private server
item.dc:creator: @Songoty Songoty
item.description:
@Songoty wrote:

If this is agianst the rules. im sorry.

So, first thing you need to do is to Download WoW. To do this without having to pay money, go to this site https://signup.worldofwarcraft.com/trial/10dayfreetrial.htm

So now that your there, you will see a big button Saying Create 10 day trial. Um, No. Look below it, and it will have 2 links.

If you have already created your free trial account, you may download the game directly: [PC] [MAC].
Download the Approriate Version for you. This downloads a downloader that downlaods the game onto your computer. the game is 3.6 GigaBytes. It took me 2 days and 18 hours to download it. So do it.

Now, once it is done, install WOW to your computer. Then when you try to run the game, you must log in with an account. So make a 10 day trial account, and log in with it. It will then tell you you have to update, so do it. This file is around 650mb. Now one thats done downloading, it will patch it to 2.3x. Now your ready to play on Private servers.

THIS IS THE HARDER PART KIND OF.

First, you must find a good Private Server. I reconmend MeahWoW, but thats just me. So to get started, Google WoW private servers, or meahwow. Make sure you find one that gives you the option of Burning Crusade, but doesnt MAKE you do it.

Here is a pic of a List of Server homepages

http://img516.imageshack.us/img516/5064/picturenumber1ew9.jpg

Now, go to that website, and sign up for account. Make sure its not a forum account, but a game account

http://img116.imageshack.us/img116/321/wow2je9.png

Now, your ready to find the realm. Look around the website for How to connect or something along that line.

http://img516.imageshack.us/img516/3023/wow3ub7.pngthis example gives you it to download.

Now, go to where WoW is Installed (Usually C:\ProgramFiles\WorldOfWarcraft) and find Realmlist.wtf And open it with NotePad. It should say this

set realmlist us.logon.worldofwarcraft.com set patchlist us.version.worldofwarcraft.com

Now, on the website, it should give the realm ip, so lets use meahrealm (cause thats what i use, i dont work for them or anything)

so replace

set realmlist us.logon.worldofwarcraft.com
set patchlist us.version.worldofwarcraft.com

With
set realmlist newmeahwow.dyndns.org
Now, you can start up your WoW and you can log onto the account you created! It should work. Good Luck!
